item.title: Getting started with azureservicebus
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting azureservicebus set up or installed.

item.title: Get started with queues
item.description: Sample code # More sample code can be found here. 1. Create a namespace using the Azure portal # Log on to the Azure classic portal. In the left navigation pane of the portal, click Service Bus. In the lower pane of the portal, click Create. In the Add a new namespace dialog, enter a namespace name. The system immediately checks to see if the name is available. After making sure the namespace name is available, choose the country or region in which your namespace should be hosted.
